original_text: And it shall be, when he shall be guilty in one of these things, that he shall confess that he hath sinned in that thing:
korean_text: 이 중 하나에 허물이 있을 때에는 아무 일에 잘못하였노라 자복하고

sentences.original_text: when he shall be guilty in one of these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이것들 중 한 가지에 죄가 있을 때

sentences.original_text: that he hath sinned in that thing
